PLEASE READ BEFORE SUBMITTING A PULL REQUEST.

If you believe you have found a problem that affects the security of applications that use SymCrypt, please do NOT
create a GitHub pull request or issue, but instead email your issue details to secure@microsoft.com. Your
report may be eligible for a bug bounty, but ONLY if it is reported through email.

We love to receive comments and suggestions. Unfortunately we cannot accept external code contributions except in
specific circumstances from vetted partners with whom we have a pre-arranged agreement. If you have a feature request
or suggested change, please start by opening an issue so we can discuss if and how we can support your request.
